TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessageEncoder extends System.Object

summary.span: 編碼器是用來將訊息寫入資料流及從資料流讀取訊息的元件。

span.span: The encoder is the component that is used to write messages to a stream and to read messages from a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種基底類別 (Base Class)，提供支援多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 (MIME) 內容類型和訊息版本的實作，並根據該內容類型定義序列化和還原序列化訊息的介面。 is a base class that provides implementations that support a Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) content type and message version, and defines the interface for the serialization and deserialization of messages according to that content type. 您可以使用它做為撰寫您自己的自訂編碼器的基底類別。Use it as a base class for writing your own custom encoder. 如果您想要實作自訂訊息編碼器，請使用這個類別。Use this class if you want to implement a custom message encoder. 若要實作您自己的自訂訊息編碼器，您必須提供下列抽象基底類別的自訂實作：To implement your own custom message encoder, you must provide custom implementations of the following abstract base classes: - - - 覆寫 ，以傳回自訂 的執行個體。Override the to return an instance of your custom . 然後讓自訂 連接用來設定服務或用戶端的繫結項目堆疊，其方式是覆寫 方法來傳回此處理站的執行個體。Then wire up your custom to the binding element stack used to configure the service or client by overriding the method to return an instance of this factory. 記憶體內的訊息表示以及可寫入資料流的 XML 資訊集 (Infoset) 表示兩者間的轉換工作是封裝在 類別中，這個類別最常當做可支援特定類型 XML 編碼之 XML 讀取器和 XML 寫入器的處理站使用。The task of converting between the in-memory representation of a message and an XML Information Set (Infoset) representation that can be written to a stream is encapsulated within the class, which most commonly serves as a factory for XML readers and XML writers that support specific types of XML encodings. 上的主要方法是 和 。The key methods on are and . 會接受 物件，並將它寫入至 物件。 takes a object and writes it into a object. 會接受 物件和最大標頭大小，然後傳回 物件。 takes a object and a maximum header size and returns a object. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範衍生自 的類別範例。The following code shows an example of a class that is derived from . [!code-csharp[S_UE_CustomTextMessageEncoder#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_customtextmessageencoder/cs/customtextmessageencoder.cs#0)]

.property instance string ContentType
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ContentType As String

summary.span: 在衍生類別 (Derived Class) 中覆寫時，會取得編碼器使用的 MIME 內容類型。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the MIME content type used by the encoder.

value.span: 訊息編碼器支援的內容類型。

span.span: The content type that is supported by the message encoder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容類型是多用途網際網路郵件交換 (MIME) 標頭，出現在 MIME 訊息的開頭與個別的本文部分內。The content type is a Multipurpose Internet Mail Exchange (MIME) header that appears at the beginning of a MIME message as well as within the separate body parts. 內容類型標頭用於指定訊息本文中的媒體類型和資料子型別、完整指定訊息本文中的媒體類型和資料子型別，以及指定資料的字元編碼 (選擇性)。Content-type headers are used to specify the media type and subtype of data in the body of a message and to fully specify the media type and subtype of data in the body of a message and to specify the character encoding (optional) of the data. 範例中的 mime 內容類型，可支援:"application/soap + xml;charset = 'utf8' 」。An example of a MIME content type that can be supported: "application/soap+xml; charset=’utf8’". 詳細說明 content-type 標頭語法的文法所述[RFC 2045](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95945)，第 5.1 節。A grammar that details the syntax of the content-type header is described in [RFC 2045](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95945), Section 5.1. [RFC 2046](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95944)提供有關 MIME 媒體類型及其參數的詳細的資訊。[RFC 2046](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95944) provides detailed information on MIME media types and their parameters. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_CustomTextMessageEncoder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_customtextmessageencoder/cs/customtextmessageencoder.cs#1)]

summary.span: 從通道堆疊的適當層次中，傳回要求的型別物件 (如果有)。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.

returns.span: 要求的型別物件 (如果存在的話)，如果不存在則為 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可要求型別物件，例如，用來從通道堆疊中的適當層次設定屬性或取得狀態的介面。Use this to request a typed object such as an interface for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel stack. 如果某個層次支援傳回要求的物件，它就會傳回物件。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不是，則會將呼叫向下委派到堆疊中的下一層。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到達堆疊的底部，而且沒有任何通道層支援要求的物件，則該方法會傳回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示訊息編碼器是否支援指定的訊息層級內容類型值。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified message-level content-type value is supported by the message encoder.

returns.span: 如果支援指定的訊息層級內容類型則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the message-level content-type specified is supported; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以用來根據訊息的內容類型，判斷訊息編碼器是否可以用來讀取特定樣式的訊息。This method is used to determine whether the message encoder can be used to read a particular style of message, based on its content-type. 類別中的資訊可用來描述包含在訊息中的資料，以及判斷是否有符合的內容類型。The information in the class is used to describe the data that is contained in a message and is used to determine if there is a content-type match. 詳細說明 content-type 標頭語法的文法所述[RFC 2045](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95945)第 5.1 節。A grammar that details the syntax of the content-type header is described in [RFC 2045](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95945) Section 5.1. [RFC 2046](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95944)提供有關多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 (MIME) 媒體類型及其參數的詳細的資訊。[RFC 2046](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95944) provides detailed information on Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) media types and their parameters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何覆寫這個方法，以處理具有相同媒體類型的不同內容類型。The following code example shows how to override this method to handle different content types with the same media type. [!code-csharp[S_UE_CustomTextMessageEncoder#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_customtextmessageencoder/cs/customtextmessageencoder.cs#8)] [!code-csharp[S_UE_CustomTextMessageEncoder#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_customtextmessageencoder/cs/customtextmessageencoderfactory.cs#8)]
